doc.summary: A method to add your custom tags.
doc.text: A method to add your custom tags.

doc.summary: Called for every element from your mod.
doc.text: Called for every element from your mod. You should add tags here,  that can be inferred from the element itself.

doc.summary: A provider for tags of a type.
doc.text: A provider for tags of a type. If you want to use <ref cls="net/minecraft/tags/BlockTags">block</ref>, <ref cls="net/minecraft/tags/ItemTags">item</ref>  or <ref cls="net/minecraft/tags/FluidTags">fluid</ref> tags, use <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/tags/CommonTagsProviderBase">CommonTagsProviderBase</ref>. You can set your tags in  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/tags/TagProviderBase" method="setup" type="()void">setup</ref>. With <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/datagen/provider/tags/TagProviderBase" method="defaultTags" type="(T)void">#defaultTags(Object)</ref>, you can add default tags  that can be retrieved from the element.
